abstract: Luiz Munoz has for 44 years taken photos of the people who gather in Flushing Meadows-Corona Park in Queens to play soccer, offering to sell to players prints of their portraits or of their teams; at 82 years old, he is last of long line of photographers who plied the profession in the park, and has outlasted many of his rivals.
lead_paragraph: Luis Muñoz, 82, is the last in a long line of photographers selling weekend soccer players in Flushing Meadows-Corona Park photos of themselves.

headline.main: A Flushing Meadows Chronicler of Soccer and Immigration
headline.print_headline: A Flushing Meadows Chronicler of Soccer and Immigration

snippet: Luis Muñoz, 82, is the last in a long line of photographers selling weekend soccer players in Flushing Meadows-Corona Park photos of themselves.
